answers.answer: Tell your doctor to shut it!!
Lol I was saying the same thing but is it bad or not?

The only way you have to much weight is if your severely obese like can't hardly move..because then that causes problems for you & tour baby & can cause death for one of you..but ive gained 30 pnds already 8months pregnant this site says I've gained too much & my doctor says screw that its perfect & all baby & nothing bad all healthy for me.
Do you have gestational diabetes or high blood pressure? Are you unhealthy?  Than don't be unhappy...period!!!
I still can move an everything the site says I gain too much also
No i very healthy an my baby moves alot

I'm 33wks and have gained 32 pounds with this pregnancy.  This app says my weight gain 8 excessive,  my dr says everything looks great and my weight is great. So I'm not sure what you have gained or how much you weighed before.  If your dr is worried about your weight he should have suggested a type of diet at least or send you to a nutritionist.  If he isn't going to help you fix it then forget about what he said. Just try to eat healthy or healthier,  and drink plenty of water.
My doctor says I haven't gained enough and this app says excessive weigh gain. My dr told me there is no right or wrong anymore. Just as long as me and baby are healthy.

I wouldn't worry too much I'm 5'6 and was 135 before baby (alot of it was muscle due to my love of running) and I'm now 202... but my midwives aren't concerned as its all in my belly and boobs (I gained almost 3 cup sizes -I have dds as it is..) as long as you and baby are healthy and you get exercise you should be fine :)
I'm 34w 1day I've gained 24lbs so I'm not doing to bad. Doc said all baby. But I'm natualy a big girl so this gain to me is like I'm a whale lol

question: I'm 32 week pregnant an the doctor says I have on to much weight! What can I do?
title: help!
